i cannot get this to work on my r4 it is not an nds file how do i get it to work?
its a .rar file. you need to extract it using an unzipping tool such as winrar. just type winrar into google and get it that way. both pokemon nds files are in there.
if you read the description. you would see that these "stupid" roms as you put it, ARE IN JAPANESE. whos the dumb one now?

honestly you're making an argument out of a tiny little mistake. you're just lazy if you cant be bothered to read the descriptions. and stop complaining. its not like you have to pay for them. grow up and go complain to someone who actually gives a damn.
